name: Granny Games
description:
People memorialize their family members in many ways. Could video games serve as a memento of loved ones?

By creating four different games about my grandmothers, I hope to explore this question and discover ways of honouring elders through interactive media.

The Granny Games project was created as part of my time as Media Artist in Residence with UNB's Department of Culture and Media Studies.

Learn more about the creative process in the developer commentary video.

Thanks to Media Arts and Cultures, UNB Faculty of Arts and artsnb for supporting this project!

Main menu pixel art by Mike Hachey
Low-poly portrait in Game 4 by Tori Smith
Dynamic music in Game 4 by Norm Pothier
